CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) architecture are of particular interests since high performance devices with power conversion efficiencies ( PCE ) exceed 8% can be achieved.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| 1-3 PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) |
| Bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) architecture |
| High performance devices |
| Power conversion efficiencies (PCE) |
| Devices with power conversion efficiencies exceeding 8% |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| 1-3 PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells based on bulk-heterojunction architecture) |
| Power conversion efficiencies (PCE) exceeding 8% |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "1-3 PSCs based on bulk - heterojunction (BHJ) architecture" can be considered a type of material or device, but it is not a property. "High performance devices" and "Particular interests" are not material properties either.
